aboutText: Me llamo Ryan. Soy un desarollador de software, tengo una pasíon para los idiomas y me encanta viajar. Actualmente, pero no unicamente, trabajo como desarollador de front-end - quizás esta pagína web es mi primera obra que has visto. Mi portafolio esta creciendo y me gustaría incluirte!
compSciDes: Bachelor de la Universidad de Queen's
mecDes: Bachelor de la Universidad de Queen's
hover4info: Toca cada una para más informacíon
frontDevRole: Desarollador de Front-end - Esta pagína web!
wgRole: Desarollador de Software - The Woodbridge Group
tmxRole: Desarollador de Software - TMX Group, Razor Risk
fdInfo: This site was designed to be a simple introduction to my coding abilities as well showcasing my experience.
wgInfo: Converted the existing reporting system from an ASP.NET Web Form application to an ASP.NET MVC application, designed and created a full client and server side reporting site and implemented the Telerik Kendo UI.
tmxInfo: I worked with the team put in charge of developing the new risk analysis software. My tasks varied from programming a web application, developping a RESTful web service to documentation. This allowed me to gain valuable experience in several different computing languages: C#, HTML5, Javascript, CSS, MySQL and Powershell.
studyInfo: I graduated with a general computer science degree and gained a wide array of experience in different languages and frameworks - from command line to object-oriented programing and from data structures to functional programming: my studies were the foundation of my computer science knowledge.
contactText: Sea que busca un desarollador, sea que quiere tomar una bebida o cualquier cosa entre los dos - esto es el lugar para ponerse en contacto. Tengo ganas de recibir tu mensaje!
